import React,{useState,useRef} from 'react' import Bg from '../assets/bg.png' import './Home.scss' const Home = () => { const [errors, setErrors] = useState([]) const [values, setValues] = useState({ email:'', password:'', cpassword:'', fullname:'', phone:'', }) const inputs=[ { id:1, name:"email", type:'email', label:'Email', errorMessage:'Enter a Valid Email address!', required:true }, { id:2, name:"password", type:'password', label:'Password', errorMessage:'should be 8-20 characters and should include at least 1 lettter, 1 number and 1 special character!' }, { id:3, name:"cpassword", type:'password', label:'Confirrm Password', errorMessage:'Passwords don\'t match!' }, { id:4, name:"fullname", type:'text', label:'Fullname', errorMessage:'Full Name should be 12-20 characters!' }, { id:5, name:"phone", type:'tel', label:'Phone Number', errorMessage:'Should contain only Numbers!' } ] const ref = useRef() const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const data=new FormData(e.target) } const onChange=(e)=>{ setValues({...values,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } console.log(values) return (
